title: "Tunisia: Artificial Intelligence Is Priority for Over 85 Percent of Civil Servants"
excerpt: "Over 85% of civil servants think that it is the government's priority to adopt a national artificial intelligence strategy, reads a survey conducted by the Ministry of Industry and SMEs on the perception of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the public sector in Tunisia."
